ing: 2 Granny Smith apples, cut into small chunks
2 cups chopped walnuts, or to taste
5 tablespoons creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle WhipÂ®)
n: Chicken Salad with Apples, Grapes, and Walnuts
des: "I had chicken breasts left over from a BBQ I had and decided to make a chicken salad. I couldn't find a recipe that I liked so I played around and came up with this. It is delicious!"
ins:
Toss shredded chicken, apple chunks, walnuts, red onion, celery, and lemon juice together in a large bowl.
Whisk vanilla yogurt, salad dressing, and mayonnaise together in a separate bowl; pour over the chicken mixture and stir to coat. Gently fold the grapes into the salad.
